questions.question: This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
Set on a cloud island, this arc features a battle against a powerful Warlord of the Sea known for his fiery fists. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to manipulate, produce, and turn into ice. What is...?
This ability allows its user to swim through the ground as if it were water, used notably by a member of the Shichibukai. What is...?
This Devil Fruit power allows its user to manipulate and create biscuits at will. What is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This captain of the Red Hair Pirates is known for his laid-back demeanor and being one of the Four Emperors. Who is...?
This character, a former Revolutionary Army commander, is known for his ability to create destructive earthquakes with the Gura Gura no Mi. Who is...?
